enWisdom: Blessed is he who remembers the Hereafter and thus does good
Every moment you come closer to death, so improve your deeds

Wisdom: مَنْ تَرَقَّبَ الْمَوْتَ سَارَعَ إِلَى الْخَيْرَاتِ
enWisdom: One who anticipates death hastens towards good deeds

Wisdom: مَنْ سَعَى لِدَارِ إِقَامَتِهِ خَلُصَ عَمَلُهُ وَكَثُرَ وَجَلُهُ
enWisdom: Whoever strives for his permanent abode, his action becomes sincere and his fear [of displeasing Allah] increases

Wisdom: مَنْ أَيْقَنَ بِالْمُجَازَاةِ لَمْ يُؤْثِرْ غَيْرَ الْحُسْنَى
enWisdom: One who is certain about requital does not choose [to do] anything but good
How good a preparation working for the Hereafter is!

Wisdom: نَالَ الْمُنَى مَنْ عَمِلَ لِدَارِ الْبَقَاءِ
enWisdom: He who works for the Eternal Abode attains his aspiration
